thread.title: Barack Obama's daughter Malia in ultimate 'rich kid' photo as she's snapped dining with A-listers in swanky Aspen
thread.title_full: Barack Obama's daughter Malia in ultimate 'rich kid' photo as she's snapped dining with A-listers in swanky Aspen

author: Lucy Clarke-Billings
title: Barack Obama's daughter Malia in ultimate 'rich kid' photo as she's snapped dining with A-listers in swanky Aspen
text:
Malia recently went on an 83-day trip to South America (Photo: Cloud Nine Alpine Bistro/Instagram) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Malia Obama has been snapped enjoying a luxury skiing holiday in Aspen - and it appears she keeps very fashionable company. 
The 18-year-old , who said to be a longtime fan of Colorado’s Rocky Mountains, was wearing a blue and red hat with "USA" written on the front. 
The resort, while renowned for its winter sports, is also home to a slew of high-end restaurants and boutiques. 
Malia was photographed at the 5 star Cloud Nine Bistro - described online as a "bucket-list worthy experience" - with a large A-List group. 
Some of her famous friends included, designer to the stars, Monique Lhuillier, 76, New York Giants chairman Steve Tisch‘s children, Elizabeth, Zachary and Holden, Diane Von Furstenberg‘s grandson, Tassilo, Billionaire Bobby Kotick‘s daughter, Audrey, and many more. Read More Malia was all smiles on her skiing holiday (Photo: Getty) 
In the picture we can see: 
1. Malia 2. Elizabeth Tisch, daughter of NY Giants co-owner Steve Tisch 3. Audrey Kotick, daughter Robert Kotick , an American businessman who currently serves as president and CEO of Activision Blizzard 4. Fashion designer Monique Lhuillier, who is most prominently known for bridal wear. She owns a fashion house based in Los Angeles, California, as well as another store on Manhattan's Upper East Side 
5. Jamie Tisch, ex-wife of Steve 6. Tom Bugbee, Monique Lhuillier's husband 7. Holden Tisch, daughter of Steve 8. Zachary Tisch, son of Steve 9. Tassilo von Furstenberg, grandson of Diane von Furstenberg, a Belgian-American fashion designer 
Malia recently went on an 83-day trip to South America, taking in Bolivia and Peru. She is heading to Harvard University this autumn. Like us on Facebook
